title: World Athletics Championships 2025: 100m finals, men’s 10,000m and more – live
summary: Daniel Harris reports live from Tokyo, covering an exciting evening of competitions. Athletes are vying for medals in various events. Stay tuned for updates on the outcomes and highlights of the night.

title: Wilder to return at Sheffield United after Sellés sacking, Manchester derby buildup – matchday live
summary: Stay updated on the latest happenings in European football as clubs engage in a flurry of matches and activities. Key news, transfers, and highlights from the day's games will be covered. Don't miss any crucial updates in the football world!

title: Scale of ‘Unite the Kingdom’ march shows free speech ‘alive and well’ in UK, says minister – UK politics live
summary: Peter Kyle expressed that he wasn't troubled by the large far-right protest organized by Tommy Robinson, but he strongly condemned any violence directed at the police. His comments come amidst rising tensions during such demonstrations. Kyle emphasized the importance of peaceful expression and respect for law enforcement.

title: Sheffield United to reappoint Chris Wilder as manager after sacking Sellés
summary: Sheffield United has terminated the contract of manager Rubén Sellés after only five games in the Championship. Chris Wilder, who previously managed the team, has been reappointed to take over the role. This marks a swift change in leadership as the club seeks to improve its performance.

title: Brazilian musician identified as victim of 1976 killing by Argentina military
summary: Bossa nova pianist Francisco Tenório Cerqueira Júnior went missing after leaving a concert in Buenos Aires to buy cigarettes. A forensic team has now confirmed details surrounding his fate. The investigation sheds light on the circumstances of his disappearance.
